name: 李有豐
objective:
探究土木材料基本性能及重要性
了解土木材料與結構行為間關係
熟悉土木材料相關檢驗及試驗
如何妥適選用土木材料於結構物
土木材料問題研析與處理
新材料的應用等

Physical,chemical,and molecular properties of materials commonly employed in civil engineering works.Influence of these properties on the performance and use of materials. 
Emphasis on laboratory evaluation of properties that control the performance of materials.
